albums.name: Is This It
albums.description: The best debut album of all time

albums.name: Room on Fire
albums.description: A strong follow-up with catchy hooks and tight production

albums.name: First Impressions of Earth
albums.description: Darker and more experimental, but could be ordered better

albums.name: Angles
albums.description: A mixed bag with some standout tracks

albums.name: The New Abnormal
albums.description: A mature return to form with great songwriting

albums.name: Favourite Worst Nightmare
albums.description: The perfect blend of all the eras of the band

albums.name: Suck It and See
albums.description: Has some strong songs, but leans too much towards traditional rock

albums.name: AM
albums.description: They sold out, but that doesn't stop the songs from being good

albums.name: Tranquility Base Hotel & Casino
albums.description: Jazz was never this cool before

albums.name: The Car
albums.description: Alex is a full on jazz prince now

albums.name: Only God Was Above Us
albums.description: Thrilling anti-pop multi instrumental piano ballads

albums.name: Wishful Thinking (At Its Best)
albums.description: The perfect brainchild of The Strokes and Arctic Monkeys
